channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
A few questions. Maybe you can help with at least one of them.
1. -Fixed-
2. How can I make a NPC face a different way?
3. I don't have a Class8.Java in my client. I don't wanna copy the one from my other client because it has tons of INTS already how would I add the ints for my models.
I'm sure there will be more. I will just continue reusing this thread.

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

Answer To #1… go into player.java and look for // Giving the player an unique look. under that is starting oufit

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

1.look for a code like this[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
sendMessage(“Go to the skilling area on the emote tablet if you need more money.”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but… ");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried getting more than one starter package lulz ");

        }
    }[/code]

change the add item code to watever you want it to be 995 being money 996 in a server idk why i belive 392 as in food hope this helps
2.i hav no idea

Read full topic
